com.uct.cs.wsintelliauction.util

Class ThreadManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uct.cs.wsintelliauction.util.ThreadManager

  • public final class ThreadManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Global thread manager and allocater. Thread pool is initialized prior to execution of other applications. Thread assignment and other functions are all statically accessed. This class cannot be constructed or inherited.
    Author:
    James Lewis

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long MILLIS_PER_SECONDS
      Number of milliseconds per second.
      static int THREAD_POOL_SIZE

    • Method Detail

      • assignThread

        public static void assignThread(java.lang.Runnable r)
        Assign a runnable a worker thread from the thread pool.
        Parameters:
        r - Runnable instance

      • assignThread

        public static <E> java.util.concurrent.Future<E> assignThread(java.util.concurrent.Callable<E> r)
        Assign a callable a worker thread from the thread pool. Returns a future object, allow for access to a result after completion.
        Parameters:
        r - Callable instance.
        Returns:
        Future result.

      • closeThreads

        public static boolean closeThreads()
        Begin orderly shutdown of all threads in the thread pool. Will block for a specified time period waiting for all previously submitted tasks to complete.
        Returns:
        Boolean True if able to shutdown threads, false if failed.

      • killThreads

        public static boolean killThreads()
        Begin immediate shutdown of all threads in thread pool. Will block for a specified time period waiting for all previously submitted tasks to complete. If a thread is blocked and does not respond to an interrupt, it may not be possible to terminate.
        Returns:
        Boolean True if able to shutdown threads, false if failed.

      • pauseThisForMillis

        public static boolean pauseThisForMillis(long milliseconds)
        Pauses the thread which calls this method for a certain length of time. The pause may be interrupted if another thread calls an interrupt on the thread being paused.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - Length of time in MILLISECONDS to pause.
        Returns:
        True if the pause was successful, false if interrupted.

      • pauseThisForSeconds

        public static boolean pauseThisForSeconds(int seconds)
        Pauses the thread which calls this method for a certain length of time. The pause may be interrupted if another thread calls an interrupt on the thread being paused.
        Parameters:
        seconds - Length of time in SECONDS to pause.
        Returns:
        True if the pause was successful, false if interrupted.

      • pauseThisForSecondsAndMillis

        public static boolean pauseThisForSecondsAndMillis(int seconds,
                                   long millis)
        Pauses the thread which calls this method for a certain length of time. The pause may be interrupted if another thread calls an interrupt on the thread being paused.
        Parameters:
        seconds - Length of time in SECONDS to pause.
        millis - Additional milliseconds to pause.
        Returns:
        True if the pause was successful, false if interrupted.

      • pauseThisForMillisIgnoreInterupt

        public static void pauseThisForMillisIgnoreInterupt(long millis)
        Pauses the thread which calls this method for a certain length of time. The pause ignores all interrupts. This method guarantees that the delay time will not be interrupted, and will delay >= delay time specified.
        Parameters:
        millis - Length of time in MILLISECONDS to pause.

      • pauseThisForSecondsIgnoreInterupt

        public static void pauseThisForSecondsIgnoreInterupt(int seconds)
        Pauses the thread which calls this method for a certain length of time. The pause ignores all interrupts. This method guarantees that the delay time will not be interrupted, and will delay >= delay time specified.
        Parameters:
        seconds - Length of time in SECONDS to pause.

      • pauseThisForSecondsAndMillisIgnoreInterupt

        public static void pauseThisForSecondsAndMillisIgnoreInterupt(int seconds,
                                              long millis)
        Pauses the thread which calls this method for a certain length of time. The pause ignores all interrupts. This method guarantees that the delay time will not be interrupted, and will delay >= delay time specified.
        Parameters:
        seconds - Length of time in SECONDS to pause.
        millis - Additional milliseconds to pause.
